name: Planet Minigolf
description:
Planet Minigolf™, brought to you by the creators of Zen Pinball, is an unparallelled minigolf experience, where cutting-edge visuals and state-of-the-art physics are coupled with tons of features and customization options.

Visit four exotic locations featuring a total of 144 holes designed for maximum fun.

Not enough? Design your own courses with the powerful but easy-to-use course editor, and share your creations with the Planet Minigolf™ community. Show off your courses and your best shots on Youtube by uploading your saved replays!

Customize one of the five available characters with unlockable clothes and accessories.

Take on other minigolf fans in various local and online multiplayer game modes or in the regular weekly tournaments. Video chat is supported for up to six players!

1-6 players
1MB minimum save size
SIXAXIS Motion Sensitive
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-6
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
